data.title: Under The Sun Tours
data.text:
We traveled through the Everglades, Miami, South Beach and Ft Lauderdale. We even witnessed the motorcade of a potential future President as they traveled to the swing state of Florida. Finished the day at Jaxsons Ice Cream Parlor.
Wonderful trip . Mitch was our fun and knowledgable tour guide start 8:30 am to finish 6:30 pm.He had friendly local advice on where to go to eat and what to see.  
Thank you for a fun day in Florida.

data.title: Leave The Car At The Hotel and Enjoy
data.text: Mitch picked us up at the resort and we were able to pay the reasonable cost on the van.We stayed the at Wyndham Royal Vista.  He kept us informed as to how long it would take to get there and different sites along the way.  His driving was confident but surprised we didn't get stopped for speed as he passed a policeman.  The entire trip took 5-6 hours which took us to an Airboat Tour of the Everglades, Fort Lauderdale, and Hollywood.  He recommended two restaurants for lunch and we opted for the pizza place and it was excellent.  You received a free coke for being with him if you ordered two pieces of pizza which were huge and was enough for two of us.  Mitch was very informed and seemingly really enjoyed serving us.  We stopped at a famous homemade ice cream place on the way back for an afternoon treat.  It was excellent.

data.title: Airboat Tour of the Everglades, Hotel Pick-up, All by Mitch
data.text:
We took this tour while staying at the Wyndham Royal Vista...booked easily, pick up and drop-off included.  1 hour airboat ride in the Everglades and then Alligator show...great narration during the airboat ride, many photo ops, wonderful experience.

Excellent pre-arrival prepping by Mitch.  He then dropped us off for a 1 hour lunch stop at the new Margaritaville restaurant in Hollywood (lunch was at our own expense)...a great day overall.

Mitch is a native New Yorker, having lived many years in Florida...a real character...makes the trip memorable.
